'''Warning''': '''CSV''' is the correct abbreviation frequently used in English computer jargon for "comma-separated values" here!

Do not confuse with the acronym '''CVS''' for "Concurrent Versions System" or "Concurrent Versioning System" ("Subversion" and "Git" are other common related systems for version control used in cooperative development projects).
